headline: Is Broadridge Financial Solutions (BR) Starting To Look Attractive After A Sharp Share Price Slide
summary: Investors may be wondering if Broadridge Financial Solutions is starting to look like value after a rough patch, or if the price still feels full. The stock last closed at US$172.51, with a 7.2% decline over 7 days, 22.8% decline over 30 days, 21.8% decline year to date and 27.5% decline over 1 year, while the 3 year and 5 year returns sit at 25.5% and 28.2% respectively. Those moves have come alongside ongoing market attention on Broadridge's role in financial infrastructure and corporate...
